sense.name: a verbal description or characterization of something
sense.examples: The reporter's depiction of the disaster scene was vivid. We didn't completely believe the man's depictions of his youth as a series of heroic adventures. The author's depiction of factory life in the 19th-century is fairly even-handed.

sense.name: a visual characterization of something
sense.examples: This cartoonist is famous for his ironic depictions of presidents and premiers. That painting is a well-known depiction of Washington crossing the Delaware. Van Gogh sketched and painted depictions of everyday life for European peasants.
